text: She's the latest member of her famous family to be immortalized. And Khloe Kardashian's wax figure made its debut in Las Vegas at Madame Tussauds on Tuesday morning. The 33 - year - old's shockingly accurate figurine sported a black lace bodysuit paired with jeans, a look the real Kardashian sported in October 2016 during the launch of her designer label Good American. Wow! Khloe Kardashian's wax figure made its debut in Las Vegas at Madame Tussaud's on Tuesday morning Khloe rocked a black lace Gooseberry Intimates bodysuit for the launch of her denim collection in 2016, with her life - like model rocking a similar piece of lingerie.
